title: Gold V Support Looking for Duo/Team/Subing
body:
I'm currently Gold V and I've been playing support since season 2. I'm looking for a duo, or a team. I'm also willing to sub for any team that needs a support. I can use voice communication, I wouldn't mind though I prefer not to.

**IGN**
A Literal God
**Best At**
{{champion:267}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:37}} 
**Weak At**
{{champion:223}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:26}} 
**Work Best With These ADCs**
{{champion:429}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:222}} 
**Strength**
Excellent ward coverage
**Weakness**
Sometimes dies or flashes unnecessarily to save others that are already going to die
**op.gg**
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=A+Literal+God
**lolking**
http://www.lolking.net/summoner/oce/5230239#matches
**Times Available**
Pretty much any time after 11am. Then around 6-7pm I cook dinner so lol yeah pretty much all day. If you do need me to go online just send a message on skype.

replies.body:
Hey, I was gold 5 in NA and I just transferred to OCE, I need someone to duo with me in ranked. I play zed the most
Strengths: Beast if fed early or doing good. Good mid.
Weaknesses: Don't believe in late games, if not fed do no damage.

Hi dude, I'm currently gold 5 and enjoy ADC the most.
I play Draven, Vayne and Graves.
I can also use voice chat, but if you prefer not two my ping communication is pretty good.
I'll add you in game, and maybe we could try a duo.
